column1: #Text=Shiro Shinobi says : " The Ferret brothers are backed up to zone three and the Wolfbats smell blood .
#Text=" Mako says : " They 've been paid off ; it 's the only explanation .
#Text=" Korra says : " If the Wolfbats are gon na fight dirty , then so should we .
#Text=" Mako says : " No we ca n't !
#Text=The refs have it out for us .
#Text=If we 're gon na win this thing , it has to be fair and square .
#Text=" Korra says : " Argh , that 's no fun but ... all right .
#Text=" Shiro Shinobi says : " The opening salvo is a brutal call as both sides give it their all .
#Text=But once again , Tahno sneaks in a little ice to get the upper hand .
#Text=Those look like illegal head shots to me !
#Text=" Ring announcer says : " Round two will be decided with a tie - breaker !
